data.title: Arizona Summit Law School: Tuition, Fees, Grants
data.meta_description: Cost of attendance in Arizona Summit Law School considering tuition, fees, cost of living, debt projections, scholarships, and grants.
data.text:
We no longer update information about Arizona Summit Law School because of one or more of the following reasons:

The school merged with another school.

The school closed.

The school lost its ABA accreditation.

Law School Transparency, as part of LawHubâ„¢, helps prelaw students make strategic choices about where to attend law school.
